title: Strengthening Professional Science Problem-Solving Competencies Using Adaptive Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A science problem-solving training program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, utilizing an adaptive learning system based on digital devices to provide personalized content.

learning_goals: Using PBL (Project-Based Learning) scenarios, learners can systematically analyze science-related professional problems and derive solutions.
Learners improve their learning goal achievement rate by over 80% by utilizing real-time feedback from an adaptive system.
Learners enhance self-directed learning efficiency by 30% by using content recommended based on their individual learning style data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
